basic_info.location: San Francisco, CA, USA (Pacific Time - PT)

work_habits.preferred_working_hours: early bird (07:00‑12:00 PT) with flexible afternoon
work_habits.work_environment: hybrid (3 days in office, 2 days remote)

personality.risk_tolerance: moderate‑high (comfortable with calculated market expansion risks)
personality.collaboration_style: structured; sets clear objectives and drives cross‑functional alignment
personality.stress_management_approach: regular cardio exercise, mindfulness meditation, and delegation
personality.conflict_resolution_style: direct but diplomatic; uses fact‑based mediation

availability.timezone_and_working_hours: PT, typically 07:00‑17:00 with flexibility for early calls
other_commitments: Board member of a local tech nonprofit (quarterly meetings)
Speaker at industry conferences (2‑3 per year)
availability.travel_flexibility: up to 30% of time, max 2 weeks per quarter

personal_factors.commute_situation: 30‑minute drive to office; hybrid schedule reduces commute load
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild hypertension, manages with regular cardio workouts and annual check‑ups
personal_factors.career_motivation: Passionate about scaling high‑growth tech companies and developing the next generation of sales leaders

knowledge_sharing_habits: Regular blog posts on internal knowledge base

risk_factors.potential_bottlenecks: Tends to be the final decision‑maker on high‑value deals, which can create a single‑point‑of‑failure if unavailable
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Chief Revenue Officer (CRO) or Senior VP of Sales Operations
burnout_risk_factors: High travel load during product launches
Overcommitment to mentorship and speaking engagements
Occasional over‑extension on simultaneous strategic initiatives
